lose_powers: ... lose the ability to make new memories?
... lose the ability to feel emotions?
... be forever trapped in the Thing's body?
... lose all your memories up to now?
... lose the ability to smile and laugh?
gain_powers: ... be able to summon and control thunder and lightning?
... be able to speak to animals?
... be able to turn back time?
gain_powers_catch: ... have the ability to speak every language in the world but never be able to read them?
... have the ability to read all the languages in the world but never be able to speak them?
... have clairvoyance but never have your visions believed?
... have everything you say be taken seriously and literally, no matter what?
win_thing: ... win a year's worth of coffee?
... win a year's worth of burgers?
... win a year's worth of pizza?
... win a year's worth of tea?
... spend a day with your favourite celebrity?
... win a year's worth of cake?
eat_drink: ... eat a handful of someone's hair?
... eat two raw heads of garlic?
... eat one jar of jam every day for the rest of your life?
... eat only fruits for one year?
... eat only vegetables for one year?
morality_death: ... know how ten random strangers will die?
... know how your friend will die?
... know how a heroic public figure will die?
... know how a villainous public figure will die?
... know how your enemy will die?
